items.sentence: It stopped raining, so they went on with the game.
Tom heard Mary and John fighting in the next room.
Tom helped himself to a cup of coffee and a donut.
Tom helped his mother decorate the Christmas tree.
Tom chuckled to himself as he read Mary\'s letter.
Tom didn\'t seem to be aware of what had happened.
Tom wished he hadn\'t mentioned that he knew Mary.
Tell Tom not to take all of this medicine at once.
Thank you very much for your detailed explanation.
Tom should have handled the situation differently.
Tom walked down the street whistling a happy tune.
Do you think that Tom would be willing to do that?
Do you think that Tom would mind if Mary did that?
Tom doesn\'t know the reason Mary is absent today.
I\'m only going to give you one chance to do that.
I\'m studying French because I need it for my job.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t find an empty picnic table.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t help looking at each other.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t help smiling at each other.
Tom and Mary didn\'t invite John to their wedding.
